title: The Vampires Ange De La Mort
description: Although Tori Lane loves being a stunt double in the movies, it’s only a cover for her secret life as a hired vampire assassin. After all, who wouldn’t love getting paid to kill bloodsuckers? Even though her assassination jobs come to her telepathically, the real mystery is the boss who gives her these jobs. Each assassination she’s hired for has its challenges, but when she’s sent to do a job in London, the job quickly moves beyond a challenge. It becomes the one job that could truly end her life. As if being a vampire assassin doesn’t hold enough drama, Tori also has a very complicated love life. When she finally gets the chance to date her old crush Ryder Seff, she discovers an erotic love life she never could have dreamed of. But Ryder’s been hiding a massive secret from Tori and when she discovers what it is, she quickly brings their sizzling hot love life to a halt. But Ryder refuses to let her go. Tori is all he wants, she’s all he will ever want! This is book 1 of The Vampires Ange De La Mort series.
author: B.S.M. Stoneking
